title: Not receiving Harrowing Pumpkin icon after gifting during event
body: I had gifted someone during the Harrowing event and I was supposed to get a pumpkin summoner icon, but I never received it and I was wondering if it's just still taking awhile to get it or is it a bug?

replies.body: We're still sending these gifts out, as *Ironfield* mentioned. If you don't have it by the *18th*, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take care of you. ^.^
Hi fellow summoner, i believe riot is sending the icons out until November 17th. If you don't have it by then, you can submit a support ticket and they'll help you out.
